task.title: Ejecting metadata (UI)
task.shortdesc: The type of bucket eviction from memory is set when creating or editing the bucket properties.

context.p: To specify the bucket memory size:

step.cmd: Navigate to ... Data Buckets > Create New Data Bucket (new bucket) or Data Buckets > bucket_name link > Edit (existing bucket).
In the Memory Size section, specify either Value (default) or Full eviction.
